Contributor: James Upton (Firm), printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates of 1st World War. "Poster No. 99." Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text is a quote from the Prime Minister, which says "No price can be too high when honour and freedom are at stake." No pictorial content.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 99.
